medicines:
ky
vant |
Prednisone 20 mg
Lialda 2.4 gram ,
|

ai_analysis.diagnosis: Based on medications, possible conditions include: Ulcerative Colitis, Autoimmune Disorders, Inflammatory Bowel Disease, Allergic Reactions, Inflammation
ai_analysis.routine:
For prednisone: Take with food in the morning. Monitor blood pressure regularly.
For lialda: Take with food. Avoid antacids 2 hours before or after.
General: Maintain regular sleep schedule and stay hydrated.
ai_analysis.diet:
For prednisone: Low sodium, high potassium diet. Avoid alcohol.
For lialda: High fiber diet. Stay well hydrated.
General: Balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
ai_analysis.warnings:
Prednisone may cause: increased appetite, mood changes, weight gain, high blood pressure
Lialda may cause: headache, nausea, abdominal pain, diarrhea

Consult your doctor if you experience severe or persistent side effects.
